programme.title: Earth's Great Seasons - EP 1
programme.desc: Every year, spectacular seasons transform our planet. Spring brings new life, but it's also a dash to wake up and get ahead of everyone else. Summer is a time of long days and glorious abundance. But the living isn't always easy when the temperatures rise. Autumn brings the world's most spectacular transformations. It's also the last chance to breed, to grow up, to stock up before the cold returns. During winter - the most magical, dramatic season of all - animals find inventive ways to survive.

programme.title: Eat The Week - EP 2
programme.desc: Coming to the rescue of 10 families who are facing universal culinary conundrums - whether that's eating the same old dishes every week, feeding fussy eaters or being short on time - Simon has the answer. programme.title: Franklin And Friends - EP 42
programme.desc: Franklin joins his familiar friends, Bear, Fox, Rabbit and the rest of the bunch, in new adventures in Woodland.

programme.title: Kate & Mim-Mim S2 - EP 10

programme.title: Sesame Street S47 - EP 21

programme.title: Sesame Street S47 - EP 22
programme.desc: A landmark series set in an ethnically diverse urban neighborhood where every day is a sunny one. It features songs, skits, animation and, of course, Muppets to teach preschoolers basic educational and social concepts.

programme.title: Transformers Cyberverse - EP 0007 & 0008
programme.desc: When Bumblebee can't remember what his current mission on Earth is, Windblade repairs his memory chips, enabling him to rediscover his past adventures on Cybertron. When his memories are being repaired, Bumblebee gets a clue that will lead both him and Windblade to complete their mission and save their friends, unaware that a team of Decepticons are tracking them too!

programme.title: Kody Kapow - EP 1
programme.desc: Kody Kapow is about an aspiring martial arts-style superhero named Kody who spends the summer with his extended family in a small village in China. His grandfather, a martial arts master, teaches Kody ancient lessons of mindfulness, patience and perseverance, which Kody employs as he and his super spy cousin Mei set off on adventures in the village together with their tiger friend Goji.

programme.title: Turning Mecard - EP 41
programme.desc: Jason loves the mystical minicars he hears so much about. One day, he meets Evan, a real living minicar that transforms into a creature called Mecanimal. Mecanimals are from a different world called Triforce, and have special powers to battle each other. Jason and Evan bond and realise they both need one another to find missing family members. Their quest will take them on an amazing adventure!

programme.title: Extreme Football - EP 38
programme.desc: Extreme Football is an urban spin off of traditional five-a-side incorporating elements of free running and acrobatics. Created by and for children, as soon as Samy discovers it he is determined to captain a team. He sets about recruiting his closest friend Greg and Mediterranean girl Ines as defenders, quick-witted Luna as the star striker and hyperactive Joey as goalkeeper. Together they form The Team.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S4 - EP 1
programme.desc: The Turtles face Shredders new deadly assassin and uncover a new Kraang plot. Theyll also encounter more mutants, discover more about the mysterious Kraang species, and venture into new realms.

programme.title: Abraureka S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Its back! Abraureka Season 2 is going to magically present you with some crazy Science magic tricks. Cheryl and Kyle take to the streets to test the science know-hows of Singaporeans and they come to your schools for a big Science Surprise! Have your eyes glued and brains fixed on the screens because our little Science magicians are going show you tricks that you can try at home. Are you ready to learn the tricks and trades behind the magic of Science?

programme.title: Hollywood In Vienna 2017: A Tribute To Danny Elfman
programme.desc: Hollywood in Vienna enters the realm of mythical creatures and fairy tales and honours Hollywood composer, Grammy Award Winner and four-time-Oscar-nominee Danny Elfman. The ORF Vienna Radio Symphony Orchestra under the baton of James Shearman discover with Beauty that there's an enchanted prince hiding within the fearsome Beast, explore the mysterious world to which the wardrobe in The Chronicles of Narnia leads to and accompany the brave Mulan on her adventurous journey.

programme.title: Colours Of ASEAN S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: This documentary will showcase the different traditional musical instruments in the region with the objective to promote the cultural diversity in the 10 ASEAN countries.

Always on the lookout for adventure, Belle and Sebastian will rush to anybody's rescue, friend or foe, whatever the risk!

programme.title: Canada: A Year In The Wild - EP 3
programme.desc: Canada: A Year in the Wild - Its autumn in Canada. Theres a nip in the air, and animals dont have long before winter storms batter the land. They must make the most of whatever food is available before its locked under deep snow and impenetrable ice. Only polar bears will be pleased to see sub-zero temperatures return. After four months without a proper meal, theyre desperate for the sea to freeze, so that they can go seal hunting again.

programme.title: Somebody To Love - EP 5
programme.desc: Shane and Kimberly meet Clare who shares her story of how she has moved on and found love again after a long-term relationship failed. Now happily married for two years, Clare is looking forward to the next stage of her life - having children. How did this turnaround come about? What enabled Clare to pick up the pieces and start dating again? What did she do to find her happily ever after'? Shane and Kimberly find out in the final clip of Somebody to Love.

programme.title: 三个愿望 Three Wishes - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) On Shanmei's birthday, Enlai intentionally arranges Yaozong to work overtime, preventing him from going home to celebrate her birthday. Yaozong gets angry and quits. He rushes home to celebrate her birthday but Shanmei collapses and is sent to the hospital. Yaozong is faced with the dilemma and eventually uses the last wishing coin to save Shanmei. (PG)(重)善美生日当天，恩来故意安排耀宗加班，不让他回去为善美庆生，耀宗气得辞职不干。他赶回家为善美庆生，善美却突然昏倒，被送去医院急救，情况危急。耀宗内心挣扎，最后决定利用"愿望钱币"许愿救善美。.

(PG)(重)永泰告知敏妃德伟就是陷害建中的主凶，还说可以带她去找目击证人。敏妃急联络芝仪，芝仪赶到医院，永泰却改口说他只是开玩笑。原来建中以永泰吸毒的证据威胁他不要乱说话，否则就要将证据交给警方。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 353
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. programme.title: 下一站。遇见 Hello Miss Driver - EP 16

Yu Zhu then forces Chen Xi to swear that she will not be together with Yi Yang. (重)宇琳在玉珠面前说晨曦坏话，指晨曦若是改嫁，就会把文良给她的东西全部带走，玉珠将变得一无所有，孤苦伶仃，甚至流落街头，要玉珠无论如何都要阻止晨曦和一阳在一起。玉珠遂逼晨曦发毒誓，永远不会和一阳在一起。.

(PG)(重)耀宗搞砸了佑庭与Winnie的事，心情低落时重遇卖纸巾的老婆婆。耀宗想再买"三个愿望"，老婆婆警告，这次的愿望是需要付出代价的。耀宗一阵犹豫后，仍决定买下愿望，并马上许愿要中多多头奖！.

programme.title: 行医 The Oath - EP 20
programme.desc: (R) Guo En wakes up but can only remember his parents and Zhiyi but not Minfei. Guo En past memories of dancing with someone flashes through his mind and he assumed the girl is Zhiyi. Will Guo En remember Minfei? Will Minfei be able to overcome her sickness? (PG)(重)（大结局）国恩醒来，但却不记得敏妃，只记得父母与芝仪。敏妃决定隐瞒与国恩的感情，免得国恩为她的病情而痛苦。国恩与芝仪逛街，看着街头艺人表演，脑中闪过片段，想起自己曾在这儿跟一个女孩共舞，并以为那女孩就是芝仪……。国恩是否会想起敏妃？敏妃能战胜病魔吗？.

Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

(PG)(重)一阳被晨曦一再拒绝，心情苦闷。宇琳建议由她假扮一阳女友，挑起晨曦的嫉妒心。两人在晨曦面前假装亲热，谁知晨曦却无动于衷。过后宇琳找晨曦，坦言她喜欢一阳，希望晨曦成全她。晨曦说如果宇琳真的喜欢一阳，就好好珍惜他，不要伤害他。.

programme.title: 我的打拚日记 Workman Diaries - EP 8

A young mother is willing to put in 16 hour days, 7 days a week so as to raise the family's standard of living. For an increasing number of elderly abandoned to live in the slums, they're caught in a vicious cycle, jobless and depressed, then death by suicide. Witness the underbelly of Korea through the workmen's lives! (重)韩国顶尖大学学的学生为何在毕业前，急着备考挤进财阀工作？ 要多努力工作才能买房？年轻妈妈和丈夫为创业每星期工作7天，每天16小时。许多老年为什么沦落在贫民窟，等待救赎？疲惫的韩国人要如何在首尔成就大国梦？.

programme.title: 周公找茶 Dennis Uncovers - EP 13

As the caffeine takes effect, Dennis works on uncovering secrets from his guests. His guest celebrities are not just restricted to famous personalities in show-business, they include among other successful people from the world of sports, arts and fashion. Set in a cafe where cameras are almost not in sight, recording starts the moment Dennis steps in. (重)曾经太过年轻，开录音室烧光50万、创业遇人不淑，伟菘回忆往事情绪激动.

Meida changes her attitude towards Zhengmei when Zhengmei stands up for Meida during a quarrel with Shanying. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)雅兰把吴春的提案书撕毁，吉秀却把它粘好然后送到菊熙的手上。雅兰气结，却没有对策。美达本来对正美很不满意，但正美却在美达与善英争吵时为美达出头，令美达对她改观。.

programme.title: 医生们 Doctors - EP 5

Huijing later finds out that Ruiyu is working in the same hospital. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)慧静加入了国日医院。在急症室当值的第一天，她遇到受重伤的黑社会老大，并未经上司批准便擅自进行了紧急手术，让医院里的护士和医师们留下深刻印象，却也得罪了她的上司。慧静之后更发现瑞雨也是在同一家医院工作。.

programme.title: 医生们 Doctors - EP 6
programme.desc: (Dual Language-Mandarin and Korean)(R) Ruiyu feels uncomfortable about Zhihong and Huijing working together. Yundao tells Ruiyu that he intends to get rid of Huijing. Ruiyu mistakes that Yundao is doing it to impress her. However, Yundao tells her it is because he is unhappy with Huijing. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)瑞雨对智弘和慧静一同工作感到很不安。允道告诉瑞雨他想把慧静赶走。瑞雨自作多情地以为允道是为了讨好自己，允道却毫不客气地说只是为了自己高兴，因为他看着慧静就不爽。.

"中国梦之声：我们的歌"启用了全新节目模式，旨在让榜样歌手与新声歌手联手同台竞演，两代歌手在不知对方身份情况下合唱同一首歌，“听歌识人”完成互选，并在组队竞演、对抗踢馆选手中不断挑战音乐进阶，共赴巅峰对决。暂定出席新生代歌手包括肖战，华晨宇，毛不易，刘宪华，陈意涵 etc. 榜样歌手会有李克勤，任贤齐，费玉清，周华健，草蜢，叶丽仪，徐小凤等.

programme.desc: Athea is surprised when she finds Hazran in the house. Hazran has willingly massage Athea's father. Qaryum does not want Hazran to leave them again. Athea has left her job to take care of her father who is bedridden after he had a stroke.

programme.title: Ole Ole Temasya - EP 7
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Host: Seri Wahyuni Jaes & Mastura AhmadOnce a year, the Tonle Sap river changes its flow direction. It's a natural phenomenon that ensures the streaming of fish, and the enriching of the rice paddies, thus giving Cambodians much reason to celebrate. Mastura and Seriwahyuni are treated to a grand three day event comprising boat races, fireworks and feasting on exotic local delicacies.

programme.title: Mek Gyver - EP 4
programme.desc: Her long awaited job application comes to an end when she is offered a job in Kuala Lumpur.Though happy about the interview, her happiness is short lived when her parents are against her move as they feel that she is leaving them again.

programme.title: Patah Sayap Bertongkat Paruh - EP 6
programme.desc: A heavy drama about Aliah, a single mother-divorcee who after rebuilding her life, find out that her first marriage may not be officially annulled.

programme.title: Shahrukh & Warsan - EP 6
programme.desc: Shahrukh learns about Malay movie icon P Ramlee from a documentary and wants to meet this superstar in person. While he and Warsan try to land a role in his movie, Muri Hadi helps himself to P Ramlees film reel, destroying his career and wiping P Ramlee off the cinematic history of Singapore...

programme.title: Jejak POS TKI - EP 4
programme.desc: In this episode, Anwar Tahar and team retreat to the mountains of Dieng where they witness the splendour of the Golden Sunrise. Later, they visit Telaga Cebong, Telaga Warna, Batu Ratapan Angin (Weeping Wind Stone), Carica fruit farm and Goa Petruk (Cave).

programme.title: Helo Switzerland - EP 7
programme.desc: This Travelogue features host Ben Ali's exploration to several important destinations in Switzerland including the popular big cities, small towns and interesting locations in the outskirts. More interestingly, many adventure tips for budget travelers will be revealed to guide the audience.Singaporeans don't often think of themselves as islanders - but the outlying islands are rich in cultural and social history. This feature gives us access to some of Singapore's most unique islands.

programme.title: Hola Spain Bersama Keith Foo - EP 8
programme.desc: Bilbao used to be a heavy industrial area now it has changed to an attractive tourist attraction. There are Museo Guggenheim that has a unique architecture and exhibits unique statues like 'Baloon Dog', 'Popeye'. Next to Teatro Arriaga at Arriaga Plaza. He continue his journey by walking along Ria Del Vervion a long stretch river. Then he stops over to one of the most popular soccer team in the world, Atletico Bilbao. Vizcaya Bridge, the first hanging bridge in the world. Keith try to learn the making of 'Pintxos'.

programme.title: Percaya Lagi - EP 3
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. This is a story about Anne, a single mother of four and soon to be a grandmother who gets addicted to a powerful and dangerous drug, Crystal Methamphetamine, also known as 'ICE'. Anne was so hooked on Ice that she needed to smoke it every three hours just to get by through the day. It did not bother her when her own daughters walk in on her smoking Ice. One day, Anne and her friends, get caught after an 'Ice Party'. She is sentenced to a year in prison. What sufferings did her children went through while she was imprisoned that made her vow to change?

programme.title: Next in Line
programme.desc: Swedish hip-hop star Elliphant brings a young artist to New York City for a shot at her first big break. An old tradition among musicians is that established artists help the next generation get their first big break. Swedish hip-hop icon Elliphant brings a young singer to New York City to record a track and – hopefully – lift her to the next level.

programme.title: Cut Your Teeth
programme.sub-title: The highs and lows of rock and roll
programme.desc: Follow the lives of several bands who are committed to living an alternative, rock and roll lifestyle. This documentary delves into the world of living a life dedicated to rock and roll and alternative culture. Ride with the bands and hear stories from the road. Learn how much commitment it takes to ride the ups and downs of a musician's life.

programme.title: Stronger
programme.desc: The newest film from Union Binding features 4K shredding from their stacked roster of riders. With a line-up of riders including Travis Rice, Kazu Kokubo, Gigi Rüf, and Scott Stevens, Union Binding's new film is set to blow minds with a full-length 4K snowboarding shred fest. From big mountain lines to urban rails, this flick has it all.

programme.title: Andrea Dovizioso: Undaunted
programme.desc: Follow Italy’s Andrea Dovizioso through a challenging MotoGP™ season. Follow Italy’s Andrea Dovizioso through a challenging season – one that saw him defy injury and his critics to win races and finish runner-up in the MotoGP™ world championship.

programme.title: Danny Wolf
programme.desc: Danny Wolf and T-Pain link up in the Remix Lab to put their unique spin on the Lil Skies hit, i. Danny Wolf and T-Pain link up in the latest edition of Remix Lab to put their unique spin on the Lil Skies hit, i, which Danny produced for the 2019 album Shelby.

programme.title: San Holo
programme.desc: Anna Lunoe is joined by Dutch DJ, musician and record producer San Holo in the Remix Lab. Anna Lunoe is joined by Dutch DJ, musician and record producer San Holo in the Remix Lab where he remixes the Sufjan Stevens song, Should Have Known Better.

programme.title: The Art of Flight
programme.sub-title: The world's most progressive snowboard film
programme.desc: Travis Rice and Curt Morgan's follow-up to That's It, That's All raises the bar of snowboarding, again. Curt Morgan and Travis Rice create the world's most progressive snowboard film by combining cutting-edge cinematography, stunning locales and the best freestyle snowboarding ever captured. Starring Mark Landvik, Pat Moore, John Jackson and more.

programme.title: Mission Antarctica part 1
programme.desc: British explorer Leo Houlding leads an unsupported mission to summit Antarctica's remote Spectre. British explorer Leo Houlding, French climber Jean Burgun and New Zealand cameraman Mark Sedon take on Antarctica's Spectre. It begins with a 1,700km trans-continental trek to reach the remote mountain using skis and hi-tech snowkites.

programme.title: Mission Antarctica part 2
programme.desc: We pick back up at the Spectre basecamp in Antarctica as the crew attempt to climb the north side of Spectre. We pick back up at the Spectre basecamp in Antarctica as Leo Houlding, Jean Burgun and Mark Sedon attempt to climb the north side of Spectre. But nothing on this mountain comes easily.

programme.title: Lemawork Ketema: Keep on Running
programme.sub-title: The pursuit of an Olympic dream
programme.desc: Lemawork Ketema isn't just a good runner – he has the potential to compete with the best in the world. Fleeing Ethiopia due to oppressive conditions, he heads to Austria with the hope of becoming a citizen and fulfilling his Olympic dreams. Lemawork Ketema isn't just a good runner – he has the potential to compete with the best in the world. Fleeing Ethiopia due to oppressive conditions, he heads to Austria with the hope of becoming a citizen and fulfilling his Olympic dreams.

programme.title: Azure blue barrels
programme.desc: Watch as some of the world's best surfers ride perfect tube after perfect tube in Tahiti. Watch as Nathan Florence, Matehau Tetopata, Jarrod White, Danny Fuller, Anthony Walsh, Eli Olson, Enrique Ariitu and Matahi Drollet make the most of perfect conditions in the azure blue waters of Tahiti.

programme.title: La Esfinge
programme.desc: Long-time friend and professional climber Emily Harrington takes Michelle out of her comfort zone in Peru. Trading ski poles for cams and ski boots for climbing shoes, long-time friend and professional climber Emily Harrington takes Michelle out of her comfort zone on ‘The Sphinx’.

programme.title: Skiing is dead
programme.desc: Follow Michelle and the crew through the trials and tribulations of producing and shooting Chris Benchetler's film Fire On The Mountain in 100mph winds and heavy snow flurries. Will they pull it off? Follow Michelle and the crew through the trials and tribulations of producing and shooting in 100mph winds and heavy snow flurries. Will they pull it off?

programme.title: 10 years gone
programme.desc: Michelle Parker returns to Haines in Alaska with freeskier Lexi Dupont in search of the best lines. Reflecting on her 10 years of skiing Haines in Alaska, Michelle Parker realises this big mountain destination has become a beacon for self-discovery and personal reflection.

programme.title: Onekotan
programme.desc: A group of intrepid professional skiers risk it all to ski the remote and desolate Pacific island of Onekotan. Onekotan, a Pacific island with a collapsed volcano at its centre, is one of the most isolated places on earth. The weather is unpredictable, the conditions uninhabitable, and for Matthias Haunholder the draw to ski the foreboding volcano is intense.

programme.title: Arrival and exploration
programme.desc: Join Dominik Gührs as he arrives in his favourite city, Bangkok, on the hunt for perfect wakeboarding spots. Wakeboarder Dominik Gührs is on a tour of his favourite city: Thailand's capital, Bangkok. He's on the hunt for the best spots to wakeboard in. Travel with Dominik as he flies in from Munich, Germany.

programme.title: Learning new tricks
programme.desc: Wakeboarder Dominik Gührs learns some tricks from freerunner Anan Anwar in Bangkok, before hitting the water. While in Bangkok searching for wakeboarding spots, Dominik Gührs meets up with freerunner Anan Anwar to learn some tricks. Then he gives advice to some budding wakeboarders.

programme.title: Mind of a Beast
programme.sub-title: Daigo Umehara: Japan's first pro gamer
programme.desc: Daigo Umehara has been at the top of the Street Fighter world for years, but still loves each new challenge. Daigo Umehara has been at the top of the competitive Street Fighter world since he was a teenager. Daigo opens up about the difference between himself and his competitive persona, Umehara, and talks about why he embraces each new challenge he faces.

programme.title: BOOM
programme.desc: The Nitro Snowboards team travel the globe in search of the best side of snowboarding: the fun side. The riders from the Nitro Snowboards team have blown minds with their progressive videos, but this film shows just how much fun they have while travelling, filming and shredding together.
